name: A Man Sowing; Zodiacal Sign of Scorpio
description: A Man Sowing; Zodiacal Sign of Scorpio; Master of the Lee Hours (Flemish, active about 1450 - 1470); Ghent (probably), Belgium; about 1450 - 1455; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 19.4 x 14 cm (7 5/8 x 5 1/2 in.); Ms. 2, fol. 10; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
